title: Neutron Star
description: Very good science fiction - Manchester Evening NewsLarry Niven is one of the brightest new talents in s.f. and the title story of this collection won him the 1966 Hugo Award.The seven other stories are thronged with superbly original characters and whole races of creatures such as grog, thrint and bandersnatchi, inhabiting worlds like LookItThat, Down, Jinx - indeed an entire galaxy of planets with their own histories, ecologies and cultural epochs.Contents:Neutron StarA Relic of the EmpireAt the CoreThe Soft WeaponFlatlanderThe Ethics of MadnessThe HandicappedGrendel
author: Larry Niven
